Title: Definitions Matter. Are Covid Vaccines really vaccines?
Thesis: If not, what are they? Are there any other technologies that work similarly?
Conclusion:
- Covid "vaccines" are actually gene therapy.
- Covid "vaccines" use the same technology as GM foods. Begs the question, are vaccine takers Genetically Modified Organisms?
- Big Pharma would be liable for injuries had their gene therapy product not been labelled "vaccines".
- Big Pharma is regularly paying huge fines for all kinds of nefarious practices.
- Government bodies such as the European Commission and the  US Food and drug administration have Big Pharma's back.

Piece.Title: Definition of vaccine
Piece.Thesis:
According to Cambridge Dictionary, it prevents disease and often contains a weakened or dead form of the disease-causing organism

According to Wikipedia, it provides  immunity and contains a weakened or killed form of a virus.

Content.Title: Vaccine
Content.Summary: A vaccine is a biological preparation that provides active acquired immunity to a particular infectious disease.[1] A vaccine typically contains an agent that resembles a disease-causing microorganism and is often made from weakened or killed forms of the microbe, its toxins, or one of its surface proteins. The agent stimulates the body's immune system to recognize the agent as a threat, destroy it, and to further recognize and destroy any of the microorganisms associated with that agent that it may encounter in the future. Vaccines can be prophylactic (to prevent or ameliorate the effects of a future infection by a natural or "wild" pathogen), or therapeutic (to fight a disease that has already occurred, such as cancer).[2][3][4][5] Some vaccines offer full sterilizing immunity, in which infection is prevented completely.[6]

Piece.Title: Definition of immunity
Piece.Thesis: According to Merriam-Webster dictionary it's "the power to keep yourself from being affected by a disease" and according to Oxford Languages it's "the ability of an organism to resist a particular infection or toxin by the action of specific antibodies".

Content.Title: immunity
Content.Summary: the ability of an organism to resist a particular infection or toxin by the action of specific antibodies or sensitized white blood cells.

References.Title: Definition of IMMUNITY
References.Description: the quality or state of being immune; especially : a condition of being able to resist a particular disease especially through preventing development of a pathogenic microorganism or by counteracting the effects of its products… See the full definition

Piece.Title: Definitions Matter. Is this a vaccine?
Piece.Thesis: A vaccine is supposed to give immunity. Immunity means protection. And yet Covid-vaccinated patients are dying left and right.

Piece.Title: GMO crops and foods are made with Recombinant DNA Technology
Piece.Thesis: So in Covid vaccine takers and in Genetically Modified Organisms alike, the cells are hacked into producing foreign proteins that they would never produce otherwise.

Content.Title: Genetically modified organism
Content.Summary: Genetically modified organisms (GMOs) are produced using scientific methods that include recombinant DNA technology and reproductive cloning. In reproductive cloning, a nucleus is extracted from a cell of the individual to be cloned and is inserted into the enucleated cytoplasm of a host egg (an enucleated egg is an egg cell that has had its own nucleus removed).

References.Title: genetically modified organism | Definition, Examples, & Facts
References.Description: Genetically modified organism, organism whose genome has been engineered in the laboratory in order to favor the expression of desired physiological traits or the generation of desired biological products. Learn more about the development and uses of genetically modified organisms in this article.

Piece.Title: What is the significance of a medical procedure labeled a "vaccine"?
Piece.Thesis: If a medical procedure is labeled a Vaccine, the pharmaceutical company is not liable for damages. In the unlike scenario that damages are awarded to an injured vaccine taker, it's the government that is paying.

Content.Title: Wait what? FDA wants 55 years to process FOIA request over vaccine data
Content.Summary: (Reuters) - Freedom of Information Act requests are rarely speedy, but when a group of scientists asked the federal government to share the data it relied upon in licensing Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine, the response went beyond typical bureaucratic foot-dragging.
